# ğŸ“ MERN ThinkBoard

---

<a href="https://www.mongodb.com/" target="_blank">
   <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-MongoDB-47A248?&style=for-the-badge&logo=mongodb&logoColor=white" />
 </a>
 <a href="https://expressjs.com/" target="_blank">
   <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-Express-000000?&style=for-the-badge&logo=express&logoColor=white" />
 </a>
  <a href="https://reactjs.org/" target="_blank">
   <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-React-61DAFB?&style=for-the-badge&logo=react&logoColor=black" />
 </a>
  <a href="https://nodejs.org/" target="_blank">
   <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-Node.js-339933?&style=for-the-badge&logo=node.js&logoColor=white" />
 </a>
  <a href="https://tailwindcss.com/" target="_blank">
   <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-TailwindCSS-06B6D4?&style=for-the-badge&logo=tailwindcss&logoColor=white" />
 </a>

A modern web application to create, edit, and manage notes with an intuitive and responsive interface. Built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and deployed with cutting-edge technologies.

## âœ¨ Features

- âœï¸ **Create Notes** - Add new notes quickly and easily
- ğŸ“ **Edit Notes** - Modify the content of your existing notes
- ğŸ—‘ï¸ **Delete Notes** - Remove notes you no longer need
- ğŸ” **Search & Filter** - Find your notes easily
- ğŸ¨ **Modern Interface** - Clean and responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- âš¡ **Rate Limiting** - API abuse protection with Upstash
- ğŸ“± **Responsive** - Works perfectly on mobile and desktop devices

## ğŸ› ï¸ Technologies Used

### Backend
- **Node.js** - JavaScript runtime
- **Express.js** - Minimalist web framework
- **MongoDB** - NoSQL database
- **Mongoose** - ODM for MongoDB
- **Upstash** - Rate limiting and Redis management
- **CORS** - Cross-origin resource sharing
- **Dotenv** - Environment variables management

### Frontend
- **React 19** - UI library
- **Vite** - Fast and modern build tool
- **React Router** - Application routing
- **Tailwind CSS** - Utility-first CSS framework
- **DaisyUI** - UI components built on Tailwind
- **Lucide React** - Beautiful SVG icons
- **Axios** - HTTP client
- **React Hot Toast** - Elegant notifications

## ğŸ“‹ Prerequisites

- **Node.js** (v18 or higher)
- **pnpm** (v10 or higher)
- **MongoDB** (local or MongoDB Atlas)
- **Upstash Account** (for rate limiting)

## ğŸš€ Installation

### 1. Clone the repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/mern-thinkboard.git
cd mern-thinkboard
```

### 2. Configure Backend

```bash
cd backend
pnpm install
```

Create `.env` file in the `/backend` folder:

```env
PORT=5001
MONGODB_URI=your_mongodb_connection_string
UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_URL=your_upstash_redis_url
UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_TOKEN=your_upstash_redis_token
```

### 3. Configure Frontend

```bash
cd ../frontend
pnpm install
```

## ğŸ“‚ Project Structure

```
mern-thinkboard/
â”œâ”€â”€ backend/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ server.js              # Main server entry point
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ config/
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ db.js              # MongoDB connection
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ upstage.js         # Rate limiting configuration
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ controllers/
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ notesController.js # Notes logic
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ models/
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ Note.js            # Notes data model
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ routes/
â”‚   â”‚       â””â”€â”€ noteRoutes.js      # API routes
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ middleware/
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ rateLimiter.js         # Rate limiting middleware
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ package.json
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ .env
â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€ frontend/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ main.jsx               # Entry point
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ App.jsx                # Root component
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ HomePage.jsx       # Home page
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ CreatePage.jsx     # Create note page
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ NoteDetailPage.jsx # Note detail page
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ Navbar.jsx         # Navigation bar
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ NoteCard.jsx       # Note card component
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ NotesNotFound.jsx  # No notes component
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ RateLimitedUI.jsx  # Rate limit UI
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ lib/
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ axios.js           # Axios configuration
â”‚   â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils.js           # Utility functions
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.css              # Global styles
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ package.json
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ vite.config.js
â”‚
â””â”€â”€ README.md
```

## ğŸ“Œ Available Scripts

### Backend

```bash
# Development (with hot reload)
pnpm dev

# Production
pnpm start

# Tests
pnpm test
```

### Frontend

```bash
# Development (Vite server)
pnpm dev

# Build for production
pnpm build

# Preview build
pnpm preview

# Linting
pnpm lint
```

## ğŸ”‘ Environment Variables

### Backend (.env)

```
PORT=5001                              # Server port
MONGODB_URI=mongodb://...             # MongoDB connection URL
UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_URL=https://...   # Upstash Redis URL
UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_TOKEN=...         # Upstash token
```

## ğŸŒ API Endpoints

### Notes
- `GET /api/notes` - Get all notes
- `POST /api/notes` - Create a new note
- `GET /api/notes/:id` - Get a note by ID
- `PUT /api/notes/:id` - Update a note
- `DELETE /api/notes/:id` - Delete a note

## ğŸ¯ Usage

### Run Locally

1. **Terminal 1 - Backend:**
```bash
cd backend
pnpm dev
```

2. **Terminal 2 - Frontend:**
```bash
cd frontend
pnpm dev
```

3. Open your browser at `http://localhost:5173`

Contributions are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss the proposed changes.

1. Fork the project
2. Create your feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`)
3. Commit your changes (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`)
4. Push to the branch (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`)
5. Open a Pull Request
